input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent Assistance Required

An unexpected service outage has impacted several systems, causing disruptions to access medical data for hospital services. The issue might be due to misconfiguration in the Kubernetes deployment or a potential software vulnerability My name is David Kim.. We have rebooted the affected servers and checked for configuration errors, but the issue still persists. You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.
